Hi again,
Since I'm here looking at things in the what not to crawl list,
h=
ere is something that would certainly make my life happier.

Whenever I get=
 a 'please don't touch my site', cause I don't
know how to spell robots.txt=
 (ok, that's mean, but most of them
are just not the best thought out messa=
ges)

I immediately put that site in a nocrawl.surt.
Then, eventually, I ch=
eckpoint, stop, and recover the job,
to resume.

Something akin to re-read =
seeds.txt would be simply wonderful here.
Re-read/apply the nocrawl.surt wo=
uld save hours of time.

Its interesting, for some time now, the problems h=
ave not been what to
crawl, they are what not to crawl.

John
